def_cn: (书面语中表示反对、厌烦、同情等发出的)啧啧声,咂嘴声
def_en: Tut-tut is used in writing to represent the sound that you make with your tongue touching the top of your mouth when you want to indicate disapproval, annoyance, or sympathy.

def_cn: 反对；（尤指）啧啧地表示反对
def_en: If you tut-tut about something, you express your disapproval of it, especially by making a sound with your tongue touching the top of your mouth.
